@graph.name: Sticky Sesame Cauliflower Recipe (Gluten free Vegan)
@graph.description: This Sticky Sesame Cauliflower is a crowd pleaser! Cauliflower is battered and baked , then coated in sticky spicy sesame sauce and baked again. Serve as is or with rice or in lettuce cups. Vegan Gluten-free Nut-free Refined sugar free Recipe

video.name: STICKY SESAME CAULIFLOWER - Gluten-free | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
This Sticky Sesame Cauliflower is a crowd pleaser! Cauliflower is battered and baked , then coated in sticky spicy sesame sauce and baked again. Serve as is or with rice or in lettuce cups. 
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2019/07/sticky-sesame-cauliflower-recipe.html
EVERYDAY KITCHEN BOOK: https://www.veganricha.com/vrekaz
INDIAN KITCHEN BOOK: https://www.veganricha.com/vrikamzn

When you need some sticky sweet tangy delicious sauced something, cauliflower fits right in. Cauliflower florets are tossed in a rice flour and starch batter and baked to crisp. The sticky sesame sauce uses sesame oil, garlic, ginger, soy/tamari, vinegar, maple syrup and some sriracha for heat for a addictive flavor profile. Brush this sticky sauce on the baked cauliflower and serve, or bake again for more sticky crispy cauliflower!

Serve it over rice, by itself or in lettuce wraps! I use sesame oil in the batter and the sauce for extra sesame flavor profile. For additional protein, add in some firm tofu, seitan or soycurls with the cauliflower. Lets make this!
Vegan Gluten-free Nut-free Refined sugar free Recipe

Music: Lakey Inspired - Visions

#veganricha #veganrecipes #stickysesamecauliflower #easyveganrecipes #glutenfree #cooking

recipeIngredient: 2 tsp  cornstarch or 1.5 tsp tapioca starch
dash of black pepper and cayenne
1   small head of cauliflower (, chopped into equal size florets)

recipeInstructions.text: Sticky Sesame Sauce: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Add sesame oil, garlic and ginger. Cook the garlic ginger for a minute. Add the soy sauce, rice vinegar, maple and bring to boil. Mix cornstarch in the water and add this cornstarch slurry and bring to a boil to thicken, Take off heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Sticky Sesame Sauce: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Add sesame oil, garlic and ginger. Cook the garlic ginger for a minute. Add the soy sauce, rice vinegar, maple and bring to boil. Mix cornstarch in the water and add this cornstarch slurry and bring to a boil to thicken, Take off heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Cauliflower: Preheat the oven to 425 deg F ( 220 C). Line a baking sheet or dish with parchment. In a large bowl add the dry ingredients for the batter and whisk well. Add the wet ingredients and min until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Cauliflower: Preheat the oven to 425 deg F ( 220 C). Line a baking sheet or dish with parchment. In a large bowl add the dry ingredients for the batter and whisk well. Add the wet ingredients and min until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cauliflower and mix to coat. This batter keeps thickening as it sits, so mix and toss quickly.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cauliflower and mix to coat. This batter keeps thickening as it sits, so mix and toss quickly.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to the the lined baking sheet. and bake for 30 mins. Make the sticky sauce in the meanwhile if you havent yet.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer to the the lined baking sheet. and bake for 30 mins. Make the sticky sauce in the meanwhile if you havent yet.

recipeInstructions.text: Once baked, you can do one of the following: 1. Brush the sauce over the cauliflower florets and bake for additional 10 to 15 mins (time depends on how crisp and sticky you want the sauce)2. Wait for a few mins then transfer the florets to the sauce. Mix gently to coat. Serve immediately or transfer to the baking sheet to bake for 10 to 15 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Once baked, you can do one of the following: 1. Brush the sauce over the cauliflower florets and bake for additional 10 to 15 mins (time depends on how crisp and sticky you want the sauce)2. Wait for a few mins then transfer the florets to the sauce. Mix gently to coat. Serve immediately or transfer to the baking sheet to bake for 10 to 15 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle black and white sesame seeds and chopped scallions and serve as is, or over rice or in lettuce wraps!
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle black and white sesame seeds and chopped scallions and serve as is, or over rice or in lettuce wraps!
